pens.name: Pelikan M800 Fountain Pen
pens.description: Pelikan M800 Fountain Pen. A quality writing instrument known for its craftsmanship and performance.
pens.details: The M800 represents Pelikan's commitment to traditional German craftsmanship. With its distinctive striped barrel pattern and robust piston filling system, this pen has become an icon in the fountain pen world.
pens.history: Introduced in 1987, the M800 was designed to bridge the gap between the smaller M400 and larger M1000 models. It quickly gained popularity for its perfect balance and reliable performance.

pens.name: Pilot Custom 74 Fountain Pen
pens.description: Pilot Custom 74 Fountain Pen. A quality writing instrument known for its craftsmanship and performance.
pens.details: The Custom 74 is one of Pilot's most popular fountain pens, known for its excellent writing experience and value proposition. It features Pilot's renowned gold nib and accepts both converters and cartridges.
pens.history: Part of Pilot's Custom series, the Custom 74 has been a staple in the Japanese fountain pen market since its introduction, offering exceptional quality at an accessible price point.
pens.specialNotes: Available in multiple colors and nib sizes

pens.name: Lamy 2000 Fountain Pen
pens.description: Lamy 2000 Fountain Pen. A quality writing instrument known for its craftsmanship and performance.
pens.details: Designed by Gerd A. M체ller in 1966, the Lamy 2000 is a timeless classic that embodies Bauhaus principles. Its brushed Makrolon exterior and hooded gold nib create a distinctive, minimalist aesthetic that has remained virtually unchanged for over 50 years.
pens.history: Introduced in 1966, the Lamy 2000 was revolutionary in its use of Makrolon (polycarbonate) and its innovative piston filling mechanism. It quickly became a design icon and remains one of Lamy's most popular pens.
pens.specialNotes: Available in Makrolon and stainless steel variants

pens.name: Pilot Custom 823 Fountain Pen
pens.description: Pilot Custom 823 Fountain Pen. A quality writing instrument known for its craftsmanship and performance.
pens.details: The Custom 823 represents the pinnacle of Pilot's Custom series. Its vacuum filling system provides an impressive 2.3ml ink capacity, while the transparent amber barrel allows you to monitor ink levels. The pen features Pilot's signature 14K gold nib with exceptional smoothness.
pens.history: Introduced as part of Pilot's premium Custom line, the 823 combines traditional Japanese craftsmanship with innovative filling technology, making it a favorite among pen enthusiasts worldwide.
pens.specialNotes: Available in amber, smoke, and clear variants

pens.name: Sailor 1911 Large Fountain Pen
pens.description: Classic cigar-shaped design with legendary Sailor nib
pens.details: The 1911 Large pays homage to Sailor's founding year and classic pen designs. It features Sailor's renowned 21K gold nib, known for its unique feedback and precision. The pen combines traditional aesthetics with modern Japanese engineering.
pens.history: Introduced as part of Sailor's Professional Gear series, the 1911 Large has become one of the most recognizable Japanese fountain pens, celebrated for its writing characteristics and build quality.

nib.engraving: Sailor anchor logo and size marking

pens.specialNotes: Available in multiple colors, including limited editions

pens.name: Platinum #3776 Century Fountain Pen
pens.description: Classic Japanese pen with Slip & Seal cap mechanism
pens.details: The #3776 Century is named after Mount Fuji's height (3776 meters) and represents Platinum's commitment to Japanese penmaking tradition. Its unique Slip & Seal cap mechanism ensures the pen won't dry out for up to 24 months when capped.
pens.history: Introduced in 1978, the #3776 has been continuously refined and improved. The Century version features enhanced materials and the innovative Slip & Seal cap technology.

specifications.clip: Platinum clip with heart shape, gold-plated

pens.specialNotes: Slip & Seal cap prevents drying. Available in multiple colors.

pens.name: TWSBI Diamond 580 Fountain Pen
pens.description: Transparent demonstrator with precision piston mechanism
pens.details: The Diamond 580 combines the allure of a transparent demonstrator with TWSBI's precise engineering. Its piston filling system is smooth and reliable, while the faceted barrel design provides an elegant grip. The pen showcases the ink beautifully while maintaining excellent functionality.
pens.history: TWSBI has gained a strong reputation for offering high-quality piston fillers at accessible prices. The Diamond 580 represents the brand's commitment to transparency, both literally and figuratively, in pen design.
pens.specialNotes: Available in multiple transparent and opaque colors. Includes wrench and silicone grease.

pens.name: Lamy Safari Fountain Pen
pens.description: Indestructible entry-level pen with iconic triangular grip
pens.details: The Safari is Lamy's most popular fountain pen, designed by Wolfgang Fabian in 1980. Its ABS plastic construction makes it virtually indestructible, while the triangular grip helps teach proper writing posture. Available in a wide array of vibrant colors.
pens.history: Introduced in 1980, the Safari was revolutionary in making fountain pens accessible and durable for students and everyday use. It remains one of the best-selling fountain pens worldwide.
pens.specialNotes: Available in dozens of colors. Nibs are easily interchangeable.

pens.name: Pilot Metropolitan Fountain Pen
pens.description: Exceptional value with smooth steel nib and elegant design
pens.details: The Metropolitan offers an incredible writing experience at an unbeatable price point. Its brass body provides substantial weight and durability, while the steel nib delivers smooth, consistent performance that rivals pens costing many times more.
pens.history: Introduced as the MR in Europe and Metropolitan in North America, this pen has become the go-to recommendation for fountain pen beginners, combining quality, style, and affordability.
pens.specialNotes: Exceptional value for money. Available in multiple finishes.

pens.name: Pilot Vanishing Point Fountain Pen
pens.description: Revolutionary retractable fountain pen with gold nib
pens.details: The Vanishing Point is one of the most innovative fountain pens ever created. Its unique retractable mechanism allows for one-handed operation, making it perfect for quick notes and on-the-go writing. The 18K gold nib retracts completely into the barrel, protected by a trap door mechanism.
pens.history: Introduced in 1963 as the Capless, the Vanishing Point revolutionized fountain pen design by combining the convenience of a retractable ballpoint with the writing experience of a fountain pen. It remains unique in the market.
pens.specialNotes: Available in multiple finishes. Clip position may affect grip comfort.

pens.name: Montblanc Meisterst체ck 149 Fountain Pen
pens.description: Montblanc 149 Fountain Pen. A quality writing instrument known for its craftsmanship and performance.
pens.details: The 149 is Montblanc's flagship fountain pen, instantly recognizable by its size and iconic design. Its large 18K gold nib provides a smooth, luxurious writing experience, while the piston filling system offers substantial ink capacity. This pen represents the pinnacle of European penmaking tradition.
pens.history: Introduced in 1952, the 149 has become one of the most iconic fountain pens in the world. Its size, craftsmanship, and prestige have made it a symbol of success and sophistication for generations.
pens.specialNotes: Lifetime warranty. Available with various nib options and limited editions.

pens.name: Waterman Expert Fountain Pen
pens.description: Waterman Expert Fountain Pen. A quality writing instrument known for its craftsmanship and performance.
pens.details: The Expert combines classic French elegance with modern functionality. Its lacquered finish and gold-plated trim create a sophisticated appearance, while the steel nib provides smooth, consistent writing performance suitable for daily use.
pens.history: The Expert series has been Waterman's flagship professional pen line for decades, offering a balance of style, quality, and accessibility.
pens.specialNotes: Available in multiple colors including black, blue, and burgundy

pens.name: Kaweco Sport Fountain Pen
pens.description: Kaweco Sport Fountain Pen. A quality writing instrument known for its craftsmanship and performance.
pens.details: The Sport is Kaweco's iconic pocket-sized fountain pen. Its compact design makes it perfect for carrying in a pocket or bag, while the octagonal cap prevents rolling. Despite its small size, it offers a surprisingly comfortable writing experience when posted.
pens.history: First introduced in the 1930s, the Sport has been a favorite for portable writing. The modern version maintains the classic design while incorporating contemporary materials and manufacturing techniques.
pens.specialNotes: Perfect pocket size. Available in many colors and materials including brass and aluminum.

pens.name: Parker Sonnet Fountain Pen
pens.description: Classic British design with modern French craftsmanship
pens.details: The Sonnet embodies Parker's heritage of elegant design combined with modern manufacturing. Its distinctive arrow clip and refined proportions create a pen that's both timeless and contemporary. Available with both steel and gold nib options.
pens.history: Introduced in the 1990s, the Sonnet continues Parker's tradition of creating pens that combine classic aesthetics with reliable performance, appealing to both pen enthusiasts and casual users.
pens.specialNotes: Available in multiple finishes and with gold or steel nibs

pens.name: Montblanc 149
pens.description: Montblanc 149 Fountain Pen. A quality writing instrument known for its craftsmanship and performance.
pens.details: the Montblanc 149 It features a 14K Gold nib available in F, M, B sizes. The pen uses a piston filling system.

inks.name: Tsuki-yo
inks.description: Deep blue-black, like the moonlit night
inks.details: Tsuki-yo (鸚) captures the deep blue of a moonlit night sky. This sophisticated ink offers subtle shading and excellent flow, making it perfect for both daily writing and special occasions.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens

inks.name: Brilliant Black
inks.description: Classic black ink with reliable performance
inks.details: Pelikan 4001 Brilliant Black is a time-tested ink known for its consistent performance and reliability. It dries relatively quickly and works well in all fountain pens.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens, especially German pens

inks.name: Kon-peki
inks.description: Deep cerulean blue, like the deep ocean
inks.details: Kon-peki (榮븀ˇ) is a vibrant, saturated cerulean blue that represents the deep ocean. It's one of the most popular inks in the Iroshizuku line, known for its beautiful shading and excellent behavior in all pens.
inks.compatibility: Works excellently with all fountain pens

inks.name: Yama-dori
inks.details: Yama-dori (掠깁낄) is a stunning teal ink that exhibits a dramatic red sheen when laid down heavily. It offers excellent shading and flow, making it a favorite among ink enthusiasts for its unique color characteristics.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens

inks.name: Oxford Blue
inks.details: Oxford Blue is a sophisticated dark blue that's suitable for professional use. It offers subtle shading and good flow characteristics, making it an excellent choice for daily writing.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens

inks.name: Shin-ryoku
inks.details: Shin-ryoku (曆긺) is a vibrant, fresh green that evokes the color of new leaves in spring. It offers excellent shading and smooth flow, making it perfect for adding color to your writing.
inks.compatibility: Works excellently with all fountain pens

inks.name: Serenity Blue
inks.details: Serenity Blue (formerly known as Florida Blue) is one of the most recommended inks for fountain pen users. It's safe, well-behaved, and offers excellent performance across all pen types.
inks.compatibility: Extremely safe and well-behaved with all fountain pens

inks.name: Apricot
inks.details: Apricot is a warm, inviting orange ink that brings energy to your writing. It offers good shading and smooth flow, perfect for personal notes and creative writing.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens

inks.name: Irish Green
inks.description: Rich, vibrant green with excellent shading
inks.details: Irish Green is a rich, vibrant green that captures the essence of the Irish countryside. It offers excellent shading and smooth flow, making it a favorite among green ink enthusiasts.
inks.compatibility: Works excellently with all fountain pens

inks.name: Ancient Copper
inks.details: Ancient Copper is a unique brown-orange ink that exhibits dramatic shading. It's one of Diamine's most popular inks, known for its warm tones and excellent performance.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens

inks.name: Asa-gao
inks.description: Morning glory blue, bright and cheerful
inks.details: Asa-gao (窈) is a bright, vibrant blue inspired by the morning glory flower. It offers excellent shading and smooth flow, making it perfect for daily writing with a pop of color.
inks.compatibility: Works excellently with all fountain pens

inks.name: Blue
inks.details: Lamy Blue is a standard, reliable blue ink that comes in cartridges and bottles. It's well-behaved, safe for all pens, and offers consistent performance.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens
